Definition.WordDefinition: Dakota, IL (town, FIPS 18342) Location: 42.38737 N, 89.52711 W Population (1990): 549 (203 housing units) Area: 0.7 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 61018 Dakota, MN (city, FIPS 14518) Location: 43.91178 N, 91.35856 W Population (1990): 360 (150 housing units) Area: 1.7 sq km (land), 0.8 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 55925

Dakota n 1: a member of the Siouan people of the northern Mississippi valley; commonly called the Sioux 2: the area of the states of North Dakota and South Dakota 3: the Siouan language spoken by the Dakota people
